kDesc
Hanging scroll with "Kanazawa Independence Front" written in forceful brush strokes.[#Legal]
Parchemin suspendu avec "Front indépendantiste de Kanazawa" écrit d'un trait énergique.[#Legal]
Hängende Papierrolle, auf der "Kanazawa Unabhängigkeitsfront" mit kräftigen Pinselstrichen geschrieben steht.[#Legal]
Rotolo con la frase "Fronte di indipendenza di Kanazawa" scritta con pennellate energiche.[#Legal]
Pergamino colgante con el texto "Frente por la independencia de Kanazawa" escrito con enérgicos brochazos.[#Legal]
筆文字で力強く「金沢独立戦線」と書かれた掛け軸。[#Legal]
붓글씨로 힘 있게 「카나자와 독립 전선」이라고 쓰여진 족자. [#Legal]
Japanese wall scroll in which "Kanazawa dokuritsu sensen (a 4-cell manga title)" is written on it with force by ink brush.[#Legal]
以毛筆渾勁寫上「金澤獨立戰線」字樣的掛軸。[#Legal]
以毛筆渾勁寫上「金澤獨立戰線」字樣的掛軸。[#Legal]
Hanging scroll with "Kanazawa Independence Front" written in forceful brush strokes.[#Legal]
